articles.author: Seb Starcevic, Elena Giordano
articles.title: From Trump biopic to Vatican intrigue: The political flicks of Oscars 2025 - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: It’s safe to say Donald Trump won’t be pleased by one entry on the list.
articles.content:
Before he was the president of the United States, Donald Trump was a young, ruthlessly ambitious real estate developer in New York City.
The Apprentice, starring Romanian-American actor Sebastian St… [+858 chars]
